properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAFE WHERE CAFE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT RNUM ,CAFE_CODE ,CAFE_OH ,CAFE_NAME ,CAFE_AREA ,CAFE_PHONE ,CAFE_CAPACITY ,CAFE_NOTICE ,CAFE_INFO ,CAFE_PHOTO ,AFFILIATED_CAFE ,CAFE_MAP ,DETAIL_ADDRESS ,CLOSED_DAYS ,CAFE_PAGE ,USER_ID ,CAFE_STATUS FROM ALIST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND CAFE_STATUS='N' ORDER BY AFFILIATED_CAFE DESC , CAFE_CODE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAFE WHERE CAFE_AREA LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND CAFE_STATUS='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAFE WHERE CAFE_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND CAFE_STATUS='N'

SELECT RNUM ,CAFE_CODE ,CAFE_OH ,CAFE_NAME ,CAFE_AREA ,CAFE_PHONE ,CAFE_CAPACITY ,CAFE_NOTICE ,CAFE_INFO, CAFE_PHOTO ,AFFILIATED_CAFE ,CAFE_MAP,DETAIL_ADDRESS ,CLOSED_DAYS ,CAFE_PAGE ,USER_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT CAFE_CODE ,CAFE_OH ,CAFE_NAME ,CAFE_AREA ,CAFE_PHONE ,CAFE_CAPACITY ,CAFE_NOTICE ,CAFE_INFO, CAFE_PHOTO ,AFFILIATED_CAFE ,CAFE_MAP ,DETAIL_ADDRESS ,CLOSED_DAYS ,CAFE_PAGE,USER_ID FROM CAFE WHERE CAFE_AREA LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND CAFE_STATUS='N' ORDER BY AFFILIATED_CAFE DESC , CAFE_CODE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT RNUM ,CAFE_CODE ,CAFE_OH ,CAFE_NAME ,CAFE_AREA ,CAFE_PHONE ,CAFE_CAPACITY ,CAFE_NOTICE ,CAFE_INFO, CAFE_PHOTO ,AFFILIATED_CAFE ,CAFE_MAP,DETAIL_ADDRESS ,CLOSED_DAYS ,CAFE_PAGE ,USER_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT CAFE_CODE ,CAFE_OH ,CAFE_NAME ,CAFE_AREA ,CAFE_PHONE ,CAFE_CAPACITY ,CAFE_NOTICE ,CAFE_INFO, CAFE_PHOTO ,AFFILIATED_CAFE ,CAFE_MAP ,DETAIL_ADDRESS ,CLOSED_DAYS ,CAFE_PAGE,USER_ID FROM CAFE WHERE CAFE_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND CAFE_STATUS='N' ORDER BY AFFILIATED_CAFE DESC , CAFE_CODE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT CAFE_CODE ,CAFE_OH ,CAFE_NAME ,CAFE_AREA ,CAFE_PHONE ,CAFE_CAPACITY ,CAFE_NOTICE ,CAFE_INFO ,CAFE_PHOTO ,AFFILIATED_CAFE ,CAFE_MAP ,DETAIL_ADDRESS ,CLOSED_DAYS ,CAFE_PAGE ,USER_ID FROM CAFE WHERE CAFE_CODE = ?

SELECT CAFE_CODE ,CAFE_OH ,CAFE_NAME ,CAFE_AREA ,CAFE_PHONE ,CAFE_CAPACITY ,CAFE_NOTICE ,CAFE_INFO ,CAFE_PHOTO ,AFFILIATED_CAFE ,CAFE_MAP ,DETAIL_ADDRESS ,CLOSED_DAYS ,CAFE_PAGE ,USER_ID ,CAFE_PHOTO2 ,CAFE_PHOTO3 FROM CAFE WHERE CAFE_CODE = ?

UPDATE CAFE SET CAFE_OH =? , CAFE_NAME =? , CAFE_AREA =? , CAFE_PHONE =? , CAFE_CAPACITY =? , CAFE_NOTICE =? , CAFE_INFO =? , CAFE_PHOTO =? , CAFE_MAP =? , DETAIL_ADDRESS =? , CLOSED_DAYS =? , CAFE_PAGE =? , CAFE_PHOTO2 =? , CAFE_PHOTO3 =? WHERE CAFE_CODE = ?
DELETE FROM CAFE WHERE CAFE_NAME = ? AND CAFE_PHONE = ?
UPDATE CAFE SET CAFE_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE CAFE_CODE = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAFE WHERE CAFE_STATUS = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(CAFE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') FROM dual)
